meanings.definition: A wig worn by some married Orthodox Jewish women for reasons of modesty.
meanings.sent1: She wore her sheitels to synagogue every Saturday.
meanings.sent2: The store had a variety of sheitels on display for sale.
meanings.sent3: The sheitels at the party looked so real, I almost thought they were natural hair.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of sheitels transformed her appearance like magic.
meanings.sent5: The sheitels in the shop window shimmered under the bright lights.

meanings.sent1: The sisters each had their own sheitels for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: The box was filled with beautiful sheitels of different styles.
meanings.sent3: The sheitels in the drawer seemed to multiply overnight!
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with a sea of sheitels, creating a colorful wave.
meanings.sent5: The sheitels on the mannequins looked elegant and sophisticated.
